result.title: URBANITE Mobility data sources analysis
result.description: Document that presents the results of the analysis of the data sources that are available to the project use cases It will contain among others the available data structures schematics and APIs for each data source This deliverable is the result of Task 31

result.title: URBANITE Ecosystem-v2
result.description: This deliverable will integrate all the components developed the other technical WPs in the URBANITE ecosystem Different versions of the solution will be provided following an incremental approach The first version will be an initial prototype with the core functionalities implemented the second version will augment these functionalities taking into consideration the feedback coming for the use cases and the final version will include corrections and feedback coming from the implementation of the use cases The software will be accompanied by a Technical Specification Report This deliverable encompasses the results from Task 53 and 54

result.title: Moving Abroad - Initial Running Phase
result.description: Report of results related to SMART metrics and conclusions confirmed benefits based on evidence corresponding to the first running phase of the pilot This report which aims to fulfil the requirement to periodically report progress and benefits achieved by the pilots includes both the reporting of execution of prerunning phase activities that lead to the Go Live of the pilot and the reporting of the first months of running phase and the corresponding preliminary results and findings

result.title: 1 Country-to-country peer exchanges and diffusion of learnings activity
result.description: This is about disseminating the results of pilot bootcamps developed in D43 This activity focuses on leveraging existing platform and innovative sharing format for enabling regular structured online and offline exchanges among innovators on their experiences projects This activity will be conducted in collaboration with and building on existing knowledge exchange platforms such as Apolitical which brings deep expertise in policy writing and digital design to offer insights to and engaging experiences among policymakers in formats that are digestible engaging and personalised

result.title: 3 Pilot action research projects using the OPSI Incubator model
result.description: This consists of accompanying project implementation through OECD and peer advisory support and documenting progress using the innovation facets model as a framework Advisory support would consist in bringing peer experts andor labs to contribute to problem exploration identification of portfolio of solutions and designing possible interventions For each pilot an innovation bootcamp will be organised in addition to continuous support during the development of the project
